Headline: #52 Kedzie Temporary Reroute at 26th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 52 Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 25th, Central Park, 31st and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near 26th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Clark/Division
ShortDescription: 95th-bound RedLine trains are standing at Clark/Division due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound RedLine trains are standing at Clark/Division due to a sick customer. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
